name: VNTrackRectangleRequest
desc: An image analysis request that tracks movement of a previously identified rectangular object across multiple images or video frames.

items.name: init(rectangleObservation: VNRectangleObservation)
items.desc: Creates a new rectangle tracking request with a rectangle observation.

items.name: init(rectangleObservation: VNRectangleObservation, completionHandler: VNRequestCompletionHandler?)
items.desc: Creates a new rectangle tracking request with a rectangle observation.

items.name: let VNTrackRectangleRequestRevision1: Int
items.desc: A constant for specifying revision 1 of VNTrackRectangleRequest.
